products.title: 5 in. Wet Air Stone/Granite Grinder Model GPW-215
products.description: Powerful angle grinder for grinding, cutting, and surface preparation. High-power motor delivers maximum performance for demanding applications. Tool-free guard adjustment for quick changes.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Does this come with a battery and charger?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: This depends on the specific kit you purchase. The 'tool only' version does not include a battery or charger. The kit version includes both. Please check the product title for details.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is this compatible with my existing batteries?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, this tool is compatible with all batteries from the same voltage platform. For example, all 20V MAX batteries work with all 20V MAX tools from the same brand.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is the warranty on this product?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: This product comes with a 3-year limited warranty covering defects in materials and workmanship. Register your product online within 30 days for full coverage.

products.title: 20V MAX Cordless Brushless 4-1/2 in. Angle Grinder with Paddle Switch (Tool Only)
products.description: Powerful angle grinder for grinding, cutting, and surface preparation. High-power motor delivers maximum performance for demanding applications. Tool-free guard adjustment for quick changes.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Does this come with a battery and charger?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: This depends on the specific kit you purchase. The 'tool only' version does not include a battery or charger. The kit version includes both. Please check the product title for details.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is this compatible with my existing batteries?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, this tool is compatible with all batteries from the same voltage platform. For example, all 20V MAX batteries work with all 20V MAX tools from the same brand.
